title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for June 7
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for June 7
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" Home Group (HOME). At Home Group Inc.'s shares rose to a record after the home- decor retailer released fiscal first-quarter results. Earnings and sales surpassed analysts' average estimates in a Bloomberg survey. The stock rose above $20 for the first time since At Home went public at $15 a share last August.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
